alert.note: Alert for Lower Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:09PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Plaquemines Parish through 500 PM CDT... At 409 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Venice, or 35 miles southeast of Port Sulphur, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Plaquemines Parish. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
